Private Events

Post House is an inviting, lively restaurant and boutique inn featuring a dedicated private events space ideal for large parties and special occasions. Nestled in the heart of the Old Village, Mount Pleasant, SC, Post House’s original features and historic charm lend to its unique character.
Book Now 
The Rose Room

True to its name, the light rose color palette is complemented by custom Murano chandeliers, an elegant backdrop perfect for rehearsal dinners, private brunches, cocktail parties and beyond. The Rose Room is equipped with its own private bar, dedicated events kitchen, and flat screen television to be used for presentations throughout your event if needed. The maximum seated capacity is 36.
Photo by . Sarah Westmoreland Photography LLC Book Now 
Full Buyout

For a large event, consider a full buyout of Post House. The perfect all-in-one venue, Post House provides a private dining space, ceremony space, and reception space with seven inn rooms for added charm and convenience. A full buyout includes our bar, main dining room, and courtyard. Our events team will work with you to provide the most creative and functional use of the space. The maximum capacity is 100.
Book Now
